column2: "Hm... It really is hard to make up your mind when you're choosing skills."
"I mean, it's not that easy to reset them, so I end up overthinking it to the point of not being able to decide at all."
"That's why I haven't even learned any skills yet! What a waste, huh?"
"How about you? You're not sitting on an unused pile of skill points, are you?"
"Hey, how about you show me the whole skill learning process? Aw, c'mon, please?"
"This is an explanation of skill points.  Skill points are used to learn \"class skills,\" the unique skills for each class.  Skill points are gained by leveling up and through client orders."
"You'll need to go to the Class Counter to learn class skills.  The Class Counter is in the gate area central hall."

"Use the skill tree at the Class Counter to learn class skills.  The skill tree is composed of class skill branches.  It's designed so that when a class skill exceeds a certain level, the next class skill below it can be chosen."
"Choose a class skill, then increase its level by consuming skill points.  Not all class skills can be learned, so plan how to use your skill points."
